label: confirmedDeliveryEvent
comment: A confirmed delivery event in this supply chain supply plan.
The confirmed delivery event, at line level, for this trade delivery.

rangeIncludes.comment: A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
Specification of the delivery time and quantity bucket in a demand forecast or supply schedule.
